lead_paragraph: DANIEL--Dan, "Dandy Dan", of Larchmont, passed away June 21, 2016, age 82. Memorial Mass Monday 10am Sts. John & Paul RC Church Larchmont. For more information or to place condolence, www.coxeandgraziano.com 1/3
